snippet.title: uDraw™ Dood's Big Adventure™
snippet.description:
uDraw™ Dood's Big Adventure™

Official website - http://www.worldofudraw.com

Follow us on Facebook at - http://www.facebook.com/worldofudraw

Welcome to Dood's Big Adventure!™ Using the power of the uDraw GameTablet™ players can draw, tilt and maneuver their way through 60 different fun and challenging levels. 

Customize Dood to roll, float and bounce through challenges by solving drawing related puzzles, collecting coins and defeating enemies in a world created by the user. Players construct not only the hero, but other objects and tools in the game by using drawing skills. Creativity and problem solving skills are the key to victory in 
Dood's Big Adventure.
